jobInfo.postDescription:
Software development is your passion and you are eager to apply state-of-the-art technology in the medical domain? Then this is the right place for you!
This is a software development position that is responsible for plan and design and implementation of software applications and components under the supervision of the Project Team Lead and the Software Development Lead.
 
Your tasks are
-Participate as a core member of the development team, to design and develop the cutting-edge medical imaging solution platform and get yourself familiar with Healthcare domain and technical standards.
-Work closely with the scrum team to design and develop the sub-systems and components for the solution, and ensure design consistency, code quality and proper design documentation.
-Present yourself as a good team player and passionate to work with the team to achieve the team goal.
 
You’ll bring in
-A degree in computer science or similar education
-Minimum 3 years of working experience in Java programming
-Good English and Chinese language skills
 
Technologies
-Strong experience with Java core programming technology
-Hand on experience with Hibernate, performance tuning with hibernate is a strong plus.
-Hand on experience with Restful API development.
-Familiar with JAVA-EE related technology, experience on Wildfly, EAP linked development is a plus
-Familiar with SQL development, experience with Oracle is a plus
Familiar with scalable computing system, architecture.
-Development experience on Microservices development and Data mining is a plus
-FHIR knowledge is an asset: JSON, ‎XML‎, ‎RDF
-Healthcare related domain knowledge is a plus, experience with DICOM / HL7 is an asset
 
Location: Shanghai, China
 
What we can offer you
We offer a rewarding career in a field that impacts lives, the opportunity to work with a talented, committed team of individuals, training, and career development programs, and a competitive compensation and benefits package. So are you ready to shape your future?
jobInfo.address: 上海黄浦区仙乐斯广场南京西路388号15楼

brandComInfo.introduce: 爱克发医疗科技（上海）有限公司隶属于爱克发吉华集团旗下的子公司，专注于医疗软件，主要软件技术用于医院管理系统上，尤其针对放射科，我们的项目大多是长期而复杂的，行业稳定，企业文化和谐，轻松，无任何政治斗争，是一家典型的纯外资软件公司。
